Episodes.description: Krusty has a crisis of conscience and retires from show business after his father dies before ever approving of his career. Meanwhile, Lisa becomes worried about Homer's health and life expectancy.
Episodes.title: Clown in the Dumps

Episodes.description: Homer and Bart turn to the open seas to improve their relationship, and Marge becomes a trash talking victim after she drafts Homer's fantasy football team.
Episodes.title: The Wreck of the Relationship

Episodes.description: Marge opens a sandwich franchise store after her sandwiches become a huge hit at Springfield Elementary. But running day-to-day at the store proves challenging, especially when the same franchise opens another location across the street.
Episodes.title: Super Franchise Me

Episodes.description: The 25th annual 'Simpsons' Halloween special includes an alternate dimension, a "Clockwork Orange"-style gang led by Moe and a visit from the Tracey Ullman-era Simpsons.
Episodes.title: Treehouse of Horror XXV

Episodes.description: An Assemblywoman brought in by Lisa to stop Mr. Burns' fracking operation ends up falling for him as much as he does for her.
Episodes.title: Opposites A-Frack

Episodes.description: The Simpsons meet the Planet Express crew, who have come to Springfield in the present to stop them from destroying the future.
Episodes.title: Simpsorama

Episodes.description: Bart tricks his family into a camping trip at a strange event known as "Blazing Guy" so that he can get revenge on his sadistic new fourth grade teacher.
Episodes.title: Blazed and Confused

Episodes.description: Homer forms a cover band with other dads in town when he takes up bass guitar to deal with a mid-life crisis, but the band's modest success is soon overwhelmed by Apu's breakout potential.
Episodes.title: Covercraft

Episodes.description: Marge kicks Homer out of the house for Christmas after he consoles Moe on Christmas Eve instead of going home.
Episodes.title: I Won't Be Home for Christmas

Episodes.description: An amusement park ride takes the Simpsons to the home planet of Kang and Kodos.
Episodes.title: The Man Who Came to Be Dinner

Episodes.description: Homer is hypnotized into believing he's ten years old and ends up stuck in his new age when the hypnotist dies, so he bonds with Bart and refuses to take back the responsibilities of adulthood.
Episodes.title: Episode 11 – Bart's New Friend at Couchtuner

Episodes.description: Inventor Elon Musk comes to Springfield, and Homer inspires him with a new idea that could revolutionize Springfield, but winds up costing Mr. Burns a ton of money.
Episodes.title: Episode 12 - The Musk Who Fell To Earth

Episodes.description: Marge tries to get Homer to lose weight. But instead, he finds a support group that encourages him to embrace his largeness.
Episodes.title: Walking Big & Tall

Episodes.description: Marge gets a job as a driver for a transportation app service, while Moe is forced to work as a janitor at the nuclear plant after Homer causes the bar to go bankrupt.
Episodes.title: My Fare Lady Framegrabs

Episodes.description: Moe falls in love with a Nigerian princess whose father is working out a uranium deal with Mr. Burns.
Episodes.title: The Princess Guide

Episodes.description: The congregation, led by Marge, is forced to resort to gambling in order to collect money to fix the church, which Chief Wiggum destroyed with a jet pack he received by mistake.
Episodes.title: Episode 16 - You Don't Have to Live Like a Referee

Episodes.description: After "Duffman" retires, Homer wins a reality competition to become his replacement. But his contract states that he cannot drink beer, which gives him a new perspective on alcohol.
Episodes.title: Episode 17 – Waiting for Duffman at Couchtuner

Episodes.description: Marge decides to follow Bart everywhere until he confesses to being involved in a bulldozer crash. Meanwhile, Homer ignores Santa's Little Helper when Ned gets a new dog.
Episodes.title: Peeping mom

Episodes.description: The story of Bart and Lisa's rivalry is told when Homer finds an old film strip.
Episodes.title: – The Kids Are All Fight

Episodes.description: Bart takes up smoking to impress Milhouse's cousin Annika while the rest of the family learns about Grampa's days in the Air Force.
Episodes.title: Let's Go Fly a Coot

Episodes.description: Marge convinces Springfield to pass an anti-bullying law when Bart gets bullied in dance school. Homer gets arrested for breaking that law by bullying Flanders.
Episodes.title: Bull-E

Episodes.description: Lisa joins a math team.
Episodes.title: Mathlete's Feat
